Reviews.Author: Neal Kite
Reviews.Content: "Its a $60 Android tablet" so my expectations were low to start.Its mission to give to my 2 year old to play movies and some kids games. This tablet feels like an oversize Android phone. Its very light and the plastic seems very cheap. It comes out of the box with just a basic load of Android 4.1.1 no bloatware (which is good) but I needed to load Google Services in order to set up my Google account. The tablet does have full access to the Google Play store and I have not found any app that isn't compatible yet. The charger is not a USB charger so it requires a different charging plug. However it only uses 5 volts and that is what the USBs put out, so if someone is handy they could make a cable adapter to use a USB charger. Overall I have been pretty surprised on how well this thing works. The speed of the tablet is faster than my Acer A100. The true test will see how long it lasts with the 2 year old; but for $60 its cheaper than a DVD player with more capabilities.Pro:1. Screen resolution seems pretty decent, and it is very responsive.2. No noticeable lag moving between screens.3. Minimal load of Android means more free space for apps. I have about 6 gig free space.4. HDMI output and cables are included5. SD card supported6. Cheaper than a kids tabletCons: 1. No Blue Tooth (knew this when I purchased)2. No GPS (knew this when I purchased)3. No rugged case made for it. (will have get something close and modify as needed)4. Battery life about 4 - 5 hours. "
Reviews.Title: Not bad device for the money

Reviews.Author: Catherine H. Filbey

There are 3different accessory cords for the outlets, including TV, PC and for charging. It also has an easy to understand instruction book. The things I like the most about it are1. It is easy to navigate.2. It has Wi-Fi to surf the internet.3. It has a Webcam to Skype with my friends.4. There are many apps to download to play games or read books.5. It has a camera and plays videos.6. There is a port for a mini SD card to add more storage.7. The color is super.8. It is small enough to fit in your purse or coat jacket as well as being easy for children to hold.Just remember this is not an iPad. This is a nice little tablet and fun to use!
Reviews.Title: I Love It!

Reviews.Author: ash
Reviews.Content: This tablet is great for students or kids.its small and light weight,easy to carry or put in your purse/bookbag.I had it for a couple weeks now and no issues.The internet connection is good speed and haven't had any issues with apps or downloading them.The tablet comes in a really nice box with the tablet in protective wraps.i received an instruction book,wall charger,2 USB cables, and an HDMI cable! My galaxy tab didnt even come with an HDMI cord. So if you want to watch netflix on the big screen your all set.The camera quality is low, which sucks but since I take photos with my phone or digital camera i dont really mind.(it does have front and rear camera),doesnt have bluetooth. Also, the resolution quality isnt HD quality but you can see videos and pictures really good. if your looking for a super high tech tablet like an ipad it may not be for you.however if you need something on the go like for school or keep your kids occupied for an affordable price this is great. and its an android JellyBean!Big tip: download Go Launcher EX and Go Keyboard app(for any android device) to personalize the theme of your android.get rid of those plain default looks of icons,font styles and backgrounds.this app will TOTAL change the way your Noria tablet looks!free apps too!
Reviews.Title: nice tablet

Reviews.Author: J. Davis "jzjdavis"
Reviews.Content: Just bought 3 of these for kids' Christmas presents.  I was pleasantly surprised at how responsive the screen was, especially for this price ($70).  The processing speed is also surprisingly good.  The screen is not viewable from any angle, but again, they were purchased for individual use for kids, so no complaints that way.  Two things I noted that were important to me as a user.  First, there is no access to the normal Amazon app via the Google Play store on this device.  This is the case on all 3 of the devices I ordered.  And, amazon.com is incompatible with this device, as it reads.  That was disappointing as an Amazon Prime member.  Second, I use the Xfinity Go app for my kids to watch TV/Movies as it's free for subscribers.  This app works in almost every way, but there is no sound whatsoever with any part of that app.  Again, this is the same on all 3 devices, so it's clearly an operating system issue.  Pandora works, Hulu works, the stock video app on the device works, most of the kid's games and apps seem to work.  So, again, overall for the price and what it was intended to do, it's worth what we paid.
Reviews.Title: Almost as expected

Reviews.Author: sehelfer
Reviews.Content: This is a first tablet for a teenager. It is easy to use and set up even for someone who has never used a tablet before.
Reviews.Title: A Nice Tablet

Reviews.Author: lady j
Reviews.Content: Having a great time using it makes it easy to use anywhere just love it can play games read books and do so many different things it great.
Reviews.Title: love it

Reviews.Author: Patrick King
Reviews.Content: For the price this tablet is excellent. It is easy to use with a large clear display which makes reading and writing much more comfortable than using your phone for the same projects. It is also great for Skype calls and watching Netflix or other movies or TV programs. The video quality is good and the audio quality good enough and fine when you attach head phones or speakers.The drawbacks are these: The processor is abysmally slow. Touch the Google or Kindle apps for example and then you can go a brew a pot of tea before either is loaded and ready for use. I find it very frustrating to touch a field and NOT get an I bar OR conversely you get an I bar which does not respond to the keyboard for several minutes. Also the battery has a very short life. I use this primarily for reading and after an hour or so it tells me to attach the power cordIf I had it to do again I would probably buy an iPad Mini or a Kindle Fire in the first place. Certainly if you plan to use your tablet for work get a fast one and avoid embarrassment before an impatient employer. You will not save any money buying one of these cheap tablets. You will simply use it find it useful but frustrating and buy the more expensive one after a month or so. That is certainly what is happening to me.
Reviews.Title: An Excellent low-priced tablet

Reviews.Author: dorine hounsou
Reviews.Content: I just love the weight of this tablet, it is very light I always put it in my book. I don't have to carry my laptop to school anymore. It battery gets low so quickly that I have to charge ever hour when I'm in class. However, I was unable to download applications such as instagram, viber , pnc virtual wallet. I couldn't even my PowerPoint files on this tablet it tells me " file can't open"  I use these application  and power point everyday but not having them on thistablet is really disappointing. I tired toupgrade the android operating systembut I couldn't. Therefore I went back to my old routine bringing my laptop to school . Not so cool
Reviews.Title: not bad but no so cool

Reviews.Author: Susan Heierling
Reviews.Content: This one turned out great for my sister. She wanted to bea able to have her medical information available when she needed it. She likes the music and movies also.
Reviews.Title: Good for older people to learn on.

Reviews.Author: Philw19642002 "Phil"
Reviews.Content: This may be the best tablet I have yet!! It has 8gb of memory and it works flawlessly!! I would not hesitate to buy another one.
Reviews.Title: Great Tablet Deal!!

Reviews.Author: Erik Gundersen
Reviews.Content: The charging ports soon stopped working. We were unable to charge it therefore it became useless. I really liked it while it worked.
Reviews.Title: Weak Charging ports

Reviews.Author: 6kats
Reviews.Content: I love this little Tablet.  I bought it to use to link to the TV to watch Netflex/Amazon Prime and it does a great job there. But it so easy to use I find myself grabbing it for doing things over using  my PC or Acer Tab.  So far no problems with it or the battery.  Using it streaming movies I get almost 4 hours use. Great price and so much fun to use.
Reviews.Title: Noria T2 7" Android JellyBean Tablet PC-Multi Touch 3D Gaming 8 GB Flash

Reviews.Author: Truga
Reviews.Content: There is a heartbleed virus attacking the 4.1.1 Android system. I bought the Noria. Does anyone know if the Android operating system has been ungraded?
Reviews.Title: Android 4.1.1

Reviews.Author: April Shank
Reviews.Content: So far it appears to be working just fine. It was easy to set up with my Gmail account and it has more memory than most inexpensive tablets.
Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price.

Reviews.Author: Maura Nurse
Reviews.Content: This product I send it back because it did not meet my expetation I will not recomend to wase you're time.
Reviews.Title: don't like

Reviews.Author: Tara M Cammett
Reviews.Content: Got these for my kids for Christmas.  We are 3 months from Christmas and my son is on his third replacement. Didn't have incredibly high expectation but this is ridiculous.  Not even lasting a month - AND they don't touch them during the week so it's only used on occasion on the weekends.Very disappointed.
Reviews.Title: Not even worth the $60

Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This tablet was only 70 dollars, so I wasn't expecting much. But it completely went below my standards by a long shot. It's always lagging. The video quality is terrible. Transitioning from vertical to horizontal is terribly unsmooth. And for the past few days, it hasn't even turned on. It says that the battery is dead, but when I plug the charger in, it's at 75%. Overall, this is a terrible product.
Reviews.Title: Terrible

Reviews.Author: Cheryl Egnor
Reviews.Content: It is a gift for my daughter.  I have played around with it and found it easy to download the things that I wanted on there to help her to achieve higher standards in school.  It will grow with her and she is going to love it.  She has wanted one since her computer got broke.
Reviews.Title: She will be surprised!  SHe is going to love it!

Reviews.Author: Josh Hollibaugh
Reviews.Content: I had low expectations of this because it was a $60.00 tablet. This has already stopped working and I have had it for about 3 days now. I would not buy it. It is a potatoe or with a camera.
Reviews.Title: This thing..

Reviews.Author: L. Skinner "Nurse"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this because I wanted something smaller than my Galaxy 10.1, which I love. I needed something small and inexpensive that will do the job. This is it. I gave it 3 stars because it definitely runs much slower than my Galaxy but I can use it while traveling on vacation or waiting to see the doctor. It is lighter than I expected which was a bonus. Overall I am happy with my little tablet that fits in my purse.
Reviews.Title: Good for the price.

Reviews.Author: Griggs
Reviews.Content: It was a great tablet for a 13 yr old who had to buy it with his own money nice
Reviews.Title: Awesome

Reviews.Author: Glenda S. Brooks
Reviews.Content: I want to return because fact is craked and I purchased insurance and they are now telling me I can't get a replacement.  I am furious!!!!!!!Glenda Brooks
Reviews.Title: Noria T2 7" Android JellyBean Tablet

Reviews.Author: Jennifwe
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for school. very useful the only problem i had was i only used it 3 times and it froze on me i got scared because it would not turn on even if i tried to charge it. it was like this for 2 days then i re tired again the 3rd day and it worked very weird. This Tablet is very usefull and prefect for the size
Reviews.Title: works Good

Reviews.Author: Lovey
Reviews.Content: I just received the tablet a few days ago and haven't had time to really play with it like I want to.  I have notice that once I downloaded a few apps, like Ruzzle.  It had someone else's info there. There was no indication that this was a refurbished tablet (I wouldn't have purchased a refurb.......so at this point I'm kinda waiting for the other shoe to drop.  Truly hoping that it dosent happen.  With that being said, I'm only giving it 3 stars for now.
Reviews.Title: hmmmm.....not sure yet

Reviews.Author: Devon
Reviews.Content: The overall performance er this tablet is pretty good. The camera on the other hand isn't so good. The front camera and the back camera are blury. But the apps that ive downloaded to this tablet work perfect and its pretty fast
Reviews.Title: Pretty good Cam not so

Reviews.Author: Jorginurse
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best bargain for your money. It is fast, reliable and sturdy. I am extremely happy my this tablet.
Reviews.Title: BEST BUY EVER!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Author: Kathy Pyke
Reviews.Content: I am completely satisfied with my new tablet.  It was easy to set up and I had no problems as a first time user of any tablet to get started.  It met all of my expectations.  Great product.
Reviews.Title: noria tablet

Reviews.Author: Del Monk
Reviews.Content: I love it, I use it  mostly to read my books, but I can watch videos, listen music, check my emails, ......I am happy with my Noria. :) thanks!
Reviews.Title: Work very well for my necessities.

Reviews.Author: dagogetta
Reviews.Content: This is a good product. I like the speed & its user friendly. Its not compatible to yahoo messenger ons thing I don't like & the ac charger stopped working the 1st week I got it but it can be charged on the computer is the only I didn't send it back.
Reviews.Title: very good

Reviews.Author: chad
Reviews.Content: So far the charger quit charging. I have noticed that the tablet has been freezing up a few times. If it continues I will have to return it, even though I don't want to have to do that because I have purchased about $50 in apps. I will give it a couple more weeks to decide.
Reviews.Title: Meh!

Reviews.Author: Gray boot hunter
Reviews.Content: This is a budget friendly option for kids.  It provides basic functionality, mainly access to the internet,  a camera, and the ability to download a txt app.  That is all my tween wants.
Reviews.Title: Perfect for a tween

Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Very nice delivered on time. Was very happy with what I bought. The tablet was at great cost it was in the price ranged I wanted and is a great for my kids to what they need to do and will hopefully last them a long time.
Reviews.Title: very nice

Reviews.Author: Fay
Reviews.Content: Its a great :) product but the google chrome doesn't work and sometimes the left side of screen gets dark and the wifi keeps dropping from the android.
Reviews.Title: Reactions of the device is a Wow to Nooo

Reviews.Author: abeola
Reviews.Content: The volume is a bit to low and the battery run down to fast but it not a bad tablet for kids
Reviews.Title: battery life

Reviews.Author: Odera
Reviews.Content: Don't even think of wasting your money. This is a crapy product period. First it comes in Chinese no manual. I spent an hour trying to figure how to convert it into English. It does not load anything even a youtube video. Just add a few bucks and pay  for a good product. They always told me that cheap is expensive. I now believe it.
Reviews.Title: Just add a few bucks and pay for a good product. They always told me that cheap is ...

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have send it back the same it came it didnt work it ran hot and wont come on I AM HIGHLY PISS!!!
Reviews.Title: Piss

Reviews.Author: Lisa Wilson
Reviews.Content: First I'd like to start by saying I expected this to be poorly made for the $60 I spent but I was WRONG! It came exactly as it said it would. The graphics are amazing & its exactly like an android phone. I was able to download games & even an app (free app just like microsoft) to type my papers for school (Im a college student so this was very important) and I can connect this tablet to a keyboard (also sold on amazon) for easier writing. The only drawback and reason it didn't receive 5/5 is because the battery life is about  4 hours which the seller clearly stated. I loved it so much I bought one for my 9 year old little brother who loves it as well.
Reviews.Title: Amazing!

Reviews.Author: Wendy J Grabowski
Reviews.Content: It would not even turn on. It would not charge, and we chose a white one, and they sent me a black one.
Reviews.Title: would not turn on

Reviews.Author: Melissa B "Meli"
Reviews.Content: It seems like a very basic tablet, but at least it connects to wi-fi. The sound system sucks though, you'd need headphones to be able to hear anything. My son uses it to play his reading games & other type of android system games. Screen resolution isn't all that high in definition but it works for a younger person who doesn't need anything else but educational or fun games. Good for the price though.
Reviews.Title: this is a decent beginner's tablet

Reviews.Author: Emmanuel Asante
Reviews.Content: I just received my package of two NORIA T2 7" Android JellyBean Tablet PC - Multi Touch. 3D Gaming. 8GB Flash...Chromo Inc. I've been an apple user for years so i decided to switch to android for different experience.So far im glad,all the specifications are true,and hope my mum have fun with it since i bought one for her too.I'm gradually turning my home into technology feild.lol....but anyways,i encourage y'all o buy NORIA,its awesome.
Reviews.Title: Amazing Tablet

Reviews.Author: Christopher Ngay
Reviews.Content: Usually you get what you pay for. In this case I must say I am surprised. This little tablet seems to be working fine. Slow at times and the screen resolution is a little lame. You do get a free HDMI cable which let's you plug into your TV...sweet. however there are issues with some apps not working for it. INCLUDING Amazon's. I'd recommend it. I bought it cuts my smartphone screen is cracked and getting this was cheaper than fixing it
Reviews.Title: cheap but  fills the need

Reviews.Author: numba9
Reviews.Content: This is the 2nd one I bought, works great, love how you can use a 3g dongle with it. Easy file pr app transfear to external 32 gb flashFor the price it is like the Cadilliac of the top name brands.
Reviews.Title: Just great

Reviews.Author: J. Leonard
Reviews.Content: UPS never delivered it and it took days for anything to be done.  I did get a small credit back plus the refund of the product but so not worth the hassle.  Now I keep getting emails to review the product so here you go.  Spend the extra few bucks and buy something semi-name brand.  I ended up going with this Lenevo instead and got a lot more for the money.  I think the Noria has gone down in price since then too.  It was 80 when I tried to buy it and the Lenevo was about $100.  http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00CRXZPA8/ref=oh_details_o09_s00_i00?ie=UTF8&psc;=1
Reviews.Title: Never Got It and Glad

Reviews.Author: kim
Reviews.Content: i gave this tablet to my mom for Christmas.. The charge doesnt last long, but she seems to like it..
Reviews.Title: jelly bean tablet

Reviews.Author: Paul Zimmmermann
Reviews.Content: We charged it up and my son played on it, when he tried to charge it a second time it would not charge up or turn on. I want my money back, because I am not happy with the tablet.
Reviews.Title: tablet that does not work

Reviews.Author: Lin Carroll "LSP"
Reviews.Content: At first this seemed great however my issue is trying to return it. It says there is only a 30 day return policy which of course it's now been 90 days. I would expect at least a year when cared for. The glass is extremely fragile even with a cover. A very short drop of 20 inches onto carpet,  plus a rubber mat over the carpet shattered the screen. That makes little sense. We have all dropped our smart phone at least once and that issue doesn't seems to create a serious problem. This tablet simply fell off the lap onto car floor and it seems it couldn't be possible it broke like this. Either I received an inferior product or this brand isn't like I thought it should be for $77.  It was a Christmas gift and I'm very disappointed. When I inquire information I'm told no deal. Gee I would think company policy would replace it for a slight fee. They can replace screen. I cannot. Unless it gets resolved I won't buy from this company again.
Reviews.Title: Want to return

Reviews.Author: Jody
Reviews.Content: I opened this, set it up for my daughter.  She didn't have a chance to play with it because it wouldn't turn on.  After about 10 mins messing with it and hooking it up to the charger (even though it was at 100%)  it finally worked.  I decided to turn it off and try again.  Same problem.. Sent it back!The price is great, the quality was to good to be true!
Reviews.Title: Sent mine back!

Reviews.Author: Marlin Schrock
Reviews.Content: We bought one of these and the battery would not last. We sent it back and they sent us a new one free of charge. This one is much better and works great! The product and customer service were are great.
Reviews.Title: good customer service and product
